lines.text: You know, my mother always told me if you looked deep enough in anybody... you'd always find some good, but I don't know.
With apologies to your mother, that's the second mistake she made.
If there's a plague here, you're the most important guy in this town.
Oh, yeah. I went to see my mother-in-law. She was wrestling semifinals...
As far as I know, nobody's yet figured out a way to get money back from the U.S. Government... quickly, that is.
